post.description:
Classify document content into an appropriate taxonomy and suggest relevant topics.

    This endpoint performs a two-stage LLM-based classification:
    1. Analyzes content to suggest which taxonomy it belongs to
    2. Suggests relevant topics within the selected taxonomy

    The classification results can optionally be persisted for historical tracking.

example.content_preview:
# Dopamine and Neuroplasticity

Dopamine is a crucial neurotransmitter in the brain that plays a significant role in several
functions, including reward, motivation, memory, attention, and learning. I...

suggested_taxonomy.reasoning: Document clearly focuses on neuroscience and brain health, discussing neurotransmitters, brain function, and neurological conditions

suggested_topics.reasoning: Core focus on neurotransmitter function and brain mechanisms
Discusses learning, memory, and attention which relate to mental health

post.summary: Classify document into taxonomy and topics
